input.sentences: i went to the park one afternoon .
afterward i hung out at the pier .
some people were playing music there .
i was getting hungry so i left to find something to eat .
i went to a restaurant to eat .
output.sentences: The palace surrounded by green was quiet.
Not a soul was to be found in the city.
Except two, who were working in the streets.
Initially not one person was to be found.
Then came the people who were interested.
